item.title: Statechains and Mercury Wallet-A New Privacy Technique?
item.description: podcast: https://stephanlivera.com/episode/320/ Stephan Livera: Nicholas welcome to the show. Nicholas Gregory: Hello. Thanks for having me. Stephan Livera: So Nicholas, there’s discussion in the community around scaling and how do things scale, and also how do we get more privacy in the Bitcoin ecosystem? I think these are ideas that people are talking about, and I know you’re working on some stuff that’s obviously very relevant for that as well with statechains, Mercury wallet, and stuff like that.
